name: Mooncake Shop
description:
**Celebrate the Fullmoon Festival with us! We're halving the retail price of Mooncake Shop Game just for this promotional period only!**

The very first and the only Mooncake Shop game available anywhere!
Set up your own mooncake bakery! Bake and make different kinds of mooncakes for the festivities.
From the classic white lotus mooncakes to the latest and unique snowskin mooncakes available in the market today.
Box it up for take out, combine it with exquisite tea like Pu 'er and Longjing tea and more!
Over 36 levels of fun and excitement managing your very own mooncake shop!

If you love being a manager and manage your own food empire this is the game for you! Learn how to bake mooncakes, manage customers and manage your profits! As you progress through the game you will be an expert at management and speed will come naturally. It's all about strategy!
